plot outline: Chittu (snisha chandran), a simple tribal love-girl is cogently married to jaisurya (sathya), a young and intelligent journalist from the city. Surya had decided to marry rani (chandhana shetty) after 7 long years of love affair. But the events that happened in forest just before their wedding engagement changed every thing.
title: Neelakuyil
plot: Chittu (snisha chandran), a simple tribal love-girl is cogently married to jaisurya (sathya), a young and intelligent journalist from the city. Surya had decided to marry rani (chandhana shetty) after 7 long years of love affair. But the events that happened in forest just before their wedding engagement changed every thing.
